column1: Little Goat Diner////Seriously test that billy for PEDs because Little Goat has a jam packed menu
column3: and deserts and drinks to wash it all down. I do not like to be unprepared so I carefully studied the menu for weeks before going however somehow was still dumbfounded as I read every word of the 4 page menu trying to highlight my options. Not all big menus work
column4: but this big menu encourages you to come back and try something different.
